QDRANT_API_KEY.description: API key for the Qdrant server
QDRANT_API_KEY.title: QDRANT_API_KEY

COLLECTION_NAME.description: Name of the collection to use
COLLECTION_NAME.title: COLLECTION_NAME

QDRANT_LOCAL_PATH.description: Path to the local Qdrant database (alternative to QDRANT_URL)
QDRANT_LOCAL_PATH.title: QDRANT_LOCAL_PATH

EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.description: Embedding provider to use (currently only "fastembed" is supported)
EMBEDDING_PROVIDER.title: EMBEDDING_PROVIDER

EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Name of the embedding model to use
EMBEDDING_MODEL.title: EMBEDDING_MODEL

TOOL_STORE_DESCRIPTION.description: Custom description for the store tool
TOOL_STORE_DESCRIPTION.title: TOOL_STORE_DESCRIPTION

TOOL_FIND_DESCRIPTION.description: Custom description for the find tool
TOOL_FIND_DESCRIPTION.title: TOOL_FIND_DESCRIPTION
